body_html: I think both of these points are fair, and actually 90% of the time I'd take team "It's been 10 years already migrate to Python 3!" But I also now that there are several users (non developers) that are using older software (without an ability to update for python 3) that still have a good 2 years with python 2, and would greatly benefit from having such a container. On the flip side, it really hurts them to not have it because it puts a stop to their work. It doesn't necessarily need to be maintained officially, but some kind of discussion or at least a working prototype I think would be well worth the effort.
